articles.title: Promoting African music in Europe difficult – Promoter - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: An Italy-based showbiz promoter, Henry Emehel, has said that promoting African entertainment in Europe could be quite taxing.
articles.content: An Italy-based showbiz promoter, Henry Emehel, has said that promoting African entertainment in Europe could be quite taxing. He told Saturday Beats, Promoting African entertainment in Europe is quit… [+1220 chars]

articles.author: Eoin Reynolds
articles.title: Murderer Graham Dwyer gets High Court blow in bid for freedom over phone records - Sunday World
articles.description: The ruling of the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) in Graham Dwyer's case that the indiscriminate retention of mobile phone data for use in criminal investigations is a breach of law, does not automatically mean that such evidence should be exclu…
